title: New Order - Live At The London Troxy (2011) [FLAC]
description:
Live at the London Troxy
2CD live album by New Order, recorded on 10 December 2011 at The Troxy in London. 

This release, the first since the band decided to reunite with its new lineupâ€”featuring the return of keyboardist Gillian Gilbert, with Tom Chapman replacing former bassist Peter Hookâ€”and the first show in London in over five years,[3] features the entire performance from the sold-out show.[4] During their 90 minute set, New Order performed songs spanning 25 years of hits and classic songs, alongside songs not played live since the 1980s (586, Age of Consent, Elegia, 1963),[5] and culminating with a rendition of their former incarnation Joy Division's Love Will Tear Us Apart.

Track listing

Disc one
No.	Title	
1.	Elegia 
2.	Crystal 
3.	Regret 
4.	Ceremony 
5.	Age of Consent 
6.	Love Vigilantes 
7.	Krafty 
8.	1963 
9.	Bizarre Love Triangle 
10.	True Faith 
11.	586 
12.	The Perfect Kiss 
13.	Temptation 

Disc two
No.	Title	
1.	Blue Monday 
2.	Love Will Tear Us Apart
